About Us

Geoff and Michelle are going on an indefinitely long road-trip across the country, from NYC to Seattle! We'll be spending most of our time (when not driving) skiing, climbing, and hiking.

Geoff Woo

Geoff is a mechanical engineer specializing in product design. See his portfolio at geoffwoo.com.
